import React from 'react'; import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form/immutable'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import validate from './RegisterFormValidation'; import TextField from '../elements/TextField'; import Label from '../elements/Label'; import Button from '../elements/Button'; const RegisterForm = ({ handleSubmit, isRegisterFailed,isUsernameCorrect,isPasswordCorrect }) => (
handleSubmit(e)}>

Sign Up

{ isUsernameCorrect ? () : (User is invalid(must be 4-20 characters))}

Already signed up? Login here.

{/* /row */}
) export default reduxForm({ form: 'register', validate, destroyOnUnmount: false })(RegisterForm)
